title: Vizhiye Kathai Ezhuthu Lyrics Urimaikural
stanzas:
Vizhiye Kadhai ezhudhu
kanneeril ezhuthaathe
manjal vaanam
thendral saatchi
unakkaagave naan vaazhgiren.

manjal vaanam
thendral saatchi
unakkaagave naan vaazhgiren.

Vizhiye Kadhai ezhudhu
kanneeril ezhuthaathe
manjal vaanam
thendral saatchi
unakkaagave naan vaazhgiren.

manadhil vadithu vaitha silaigal
adhil mayakkam pirakka
vaitha kalaigal (2)

megangal pol nenjil oadum
vaanathai yaar mooda koodum
unakkaagave naan vaazhgiren.

kovil pen kondathu
deivam kan thandhathu.(2)
poojai yaar seivadhu
indha poovai yaar kolvadhu.

oomai veraedhu baashai
ullathil yedhedho aasai.
unakkaagave naan vaazhgiren.

Vizhiye Kadhai ezhudhu
kanneeril ezhuthaathe
manjal vaanam
thendral saatchi
unakkaagave naan vaazhgiren.

kaalam malarkindradhu
kanavu palikkinradhu
ennathili ennenna thottram
en nenjathil
nee thandha maatram
unakkaagave naan vaazhgiren.

Vizhiye Kadhai ezhudhu
kanneeril ezhuthaathe
manjal vaanam
thendral saatchi
unakkaagave naan vaazhgiren.
